sentences.sContent: Of, like, or in an artery or arteries.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of, like, or in an artery or arteries.
sentences.sCn: 动脉的动脉的，似动脉的，或在动脉里的。

sentences.sContent: When they are found, doctors pass a tube with a balloon into the narrowed area and inflate the balloon to compress plaque deposits against the side of the artery.
sentences.sContent_eng: When they are found, doctors pass a tube with a balloon into the narrowed area and inflate the balloon to compress plaque deposits against the side of the artery.
sentences.sCn: 当它们被发现后，医生通过一个软管把一个小气球进入狭小的区域并且膨胀这个气球去压缩动脉边沉淀下来的血小板。

sentences.sContent: This term is used to describe a condition in which the blood supply to part of the brain is suddenly and critically impaired by a blood clot or when a ruptured artery leaks blood into the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: This term is used to describe a condition in which the blood supply to part of the brain is suddenly and critically impaired by a blood clot or when a ruptured artery leaks blood into the brain.
sentences.sCn: 该术语是用来形容如下的一种情况：提供给大脑部分的血液突然地削弱，这种削弱是由于血液的凝固或由于动脉割裂导致血液漏到大脑里面。

phrases.pCn: 冠状动脉旁路；冠状动脉绕道手术；冠状动脉分流术

remMethod.val: arter(管道) + y → (体内的)管道 → 动脉

words.tran: [解剖] 动脉的；干线的；像动脉的
动脉波；动脉脉搏图；动脉搏描记图
动脉 X 线摄影法

trans.tranOther: one of the tubes that carries blood from your heart to the rest of your body
